EmailTemplate.description: Public Program Level 3 ASEAN - Sent once job is Confirmed. Includes ASEAN ToB
EmailTemplate.name: 01 ASEAN Level 3 Expert Negotiator Welcome
EmailTemplate.subject: Participant Confirmation: ENSI {!Contact.Job_Public_Program_Name__c} Program on {!Contact.Job_Certificate_Date__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
As part of the ENSI {!Contact.Job_Public_Program_Name__c} program you are attending on {!Contact.Job_Certificate_Date__c} in {!Contact.Job_Venue_City__c}, please read the following information to help Empower your Negotiation Success.
Date: {!Contact.Job_Certificate_Date__c} Time: {!Contact.Job_Start_Finish_Time__c}
Venue: {!Contact.Job_Venue_Name__c} {!Contact.Job_Venue_Address__c} {!Contact.Job_City_State_PC__c} {!Contact.Job_Venue_Country__c} Map - {!Contact.Job_venue_map__c}
Program Leader/s: {!Contact.Job_Presenters__c} Dress: Smart casual
Remember to bring along your GREEN Negotiation and Influencing Manual.
If you require a new manual, please let me know as soon as possible.
The ENSI {!Contact.Job_Public_Program_Name__c} program is not only about giving you the skills required to approach negotiations confidently but to also ensure that your learnings are sustained and become a force of habit. We believe that engaging you before and after the workshop will increase your learning outcomes and ask that you participate fully in the activities outlined below.
We like to promote an informal atmosphere during the workshop and casual dress is welcome. Lunch will be provided and there will be suitable breaks during the program to enable participants to communicate with business colleagues and clients. Please advise if you have any special dietary requirements.
Pre-Program Requirements
Program Focus Questionnaire 'PFQ'- the PFQ helps the program leader to customise the program based on your needs. We ask that all PFQs are completed by {!Contact.Job_PFQ_Due_Date__c}. Click below to access the questionnaire. http://www.surveygizmo.com/s3/1263598/95eb9ccfda3c?pfq-rait&rait=NO&jid={!Contact.Last_Job_ID__c}&pid={!Contact.Last_Participant_Id__c}
Note: This link is specific to you, please don't forward to others. Please come briefed with notes on at least one current negotiation situation (for use in diagnosis and review sessions during the workshop).
Post Program Requirements
You will receive 5 reinforcement emails sent fortnightly. All attendees on our programs are automatically subscribed to our eBulletin Negotium. Negotium takes real-world negotiations and builds on them, providing commentary and tips that you can apply in your work and personal life. We have designed it to be useful to our past participants and those with a general interest in negotiation.
A full list of learning outcomes can be viewed here.
If you require accommodation, please let me know and we can recommend some hotels close to the venue. Also, please advise me within 7 days if you have any special dietary requirements.
TERMS OF BUSINESS * Registration is only confirmed on receipt of full payment * Early bird discount for payment received one month prior to start date * Group discounts available on request * Participant cancellation policy: - more than 21 days before commencement, full refund - under 21 days and more than 7 days before commencement, 50% refund - under 7 days, no refund * Transfer requests â€“ under 14 days incur SGD 350 / USD 250 charge * Any discounts/promotions are not transferrable * Substitute delegates accepted without charge up to 72 hours before program commencement * ENSI, PwC and Coalface reserves the right to cancel any program without notice
Don't hesitate to contact me if you have any queries on these arrangements.
We look forward to meeting and working with you during the workshop.
Kind regards
{!Contact.Job_CSM_Name__c} Public Program Coordinator
Suite 507, 83 York Street Sydney NSW 2000 Australia p: +61 9299 9688 f: +61 9299 1633 www.negotiate.org
Note this email and any attachments may be privileged and confidential. If you are not the intended recipient please delete the message and notify the sender. Copying or distribution by anyone else is prohibited. Thank you.
